get.description: Returns a ranked list of addresses matching the search query in the specified format.

parameters.name: input
parameters.description: Specifies the address search string (e.g. 14 Acacia Avenue, Ruislip, HA4 8RG). Can only be blank if rangekm, lat, lon and classificationfilter are supplied in which case the underlyingScore returned is the distance in km.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Specifies the offset from zero, used for pagination.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Specifies the number of addresses to return.

parameters.name: classificationfilter
parameters.description: Classification code filter. Can be pattern match (ZW*), exact match (RD06), multiple exact match (RD02,RD04) or a preset keyword such as residential, commercial, workplace or educational

parameters.name: rangekm
parameters.description: Limit results to those within this number of kilometers of point (decimal e.g. 0.1)

parameters.name: lat
parameters.description: Latitude of point in decimal format (e.g. 50.705948).

parameters.name: lon
parameters.description: Longitude of point in decimal format (e.g. -3.5091076).

parameters.name: historical
parameters.description: Include historical addresses

parameters.name: matchthreshold
parameters.description: Minimum confidence score (percentage) for match to be included in results.

parameters.name: verbose
parameters.description: Include the full address details in the response (including relatives, crossRefs, paf and nag).

parameters.name: epoch
parameters.description: Select a specific AddressBase Epoch to search.

parameters.name: fromsource
parameters.description: Set to niboost to favour Northern Ireland results, nionly or ewonly to filter (Census index only)

200.description: Success. A json return of matched addresses.

400.description: Bad request. Indicates an issue with the request. Further details are provided in the response.

401.description: Unauthorised. The API key provided with the request is invalid.

429.description: Server too busy. The Address Index API is experiencing exceptional load.

500.description: Internal server error. Failed to process the request due to an internal error.

get.description: Discovery call which names the available codelists for further calls

200.description: Success. A json return of available codelists.

400.description: Bad request. Indicates an issue with the request. Further details are provided in the response.

401.description: Unauthorised. The API key provided with the request is invalid.

429.description: Server too busy. The Address Index API is experiencing exceptional load.

500.description: Internal server error. Failed to process the request due to an internal error.

500.description: Internal server error. Failed to process the request due to an internal error.

get.description: Returns a single address, identified by its UPRN.

parameters.name: uprn
parameters.description: Specifies the address UPRN.

parameters.name: historical
parameters.description: Include historical addresses

parameters.name: verbose
parameters.description: Include the full address details in the response (including relatives, crossRefs, paf and nag).

parameters.name: epoch
parameters.description: Select a specific AddressBase Epoch to search (latest if not supplied).

200.description: Success. A json return of matched addresses.

400.description: Bad request. Indicates an issue with the request. Further details are provided in the response.

401.description: Unauthorised. The API key provided with the request is invalid.

404.description: Not found. The requested UPRN was not found in the index.

429.description: Server too busy. The Address Index API is experiencing exceptional load.

500.description: Internal server error. Failed to process the request due to an internal error.

get.summary: Search by partial address (for type ahead).
get.description: Returns a list addresses, from a partial match on the input string

parameters.name: input
parameters.description: Specifies the address input.

parameters.name: fallback
parameters.description: Specifies whether a slow fallback query is used in the event of the main query returning no results.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Specifies the offset from zero, used for pagination.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Specifies the number of addresses to return.

parameters.name: classificationfilter
parameters.description: Classification code filter. Can be pattern match (ZW*), exact match (RD06), multiple exact match (RD02,RD04) or a preset keyword such as residential, commercial, workplace or educational

parameters.name: historical
parameters.description: Include historical addresses

parameters.name: verbose
parameters.description: Include the full address details in the response (including relatives, crossRefs, paf and nag).

parameters.name: epoch
parameters.description: Select a specific AddressBase Epoch to search.

parameters.name: fromsource
parameters.description: Set to niboost to favour Northern Ireland results, nionly or ewonly to filter (Census index only)

parameters.name: highlight
parameters.description: include detailed highlighting info, options are off, on or debug

parameters.name: favourpaf
parameters.description: paf beats nag on draw for best match

parameters.name: favourwelsh
parameters.description: Welsh beats English on draw for best match

200.description: Success. A json return of matched addresses.

400.description: Bad request. Indicates an issue with the request. Further details are provided in the response.

401.description: Unauthorised. The API key provided with the request is invalid.

429.description: Server too busy. The Address Index API is experiencing exceptional load.

500.description: Internal server error. Failed to process the request due to an internal error.

parameters.name: offset

get.summary: Search for addresses in a postcode_street_town grouping (called a bucket)
get.description: Performs a wildcard search using postcode, street and town concatenated. Asterisk symbols can be used for wildcarding.

parameters.name: postcode
parameters.description: Specifies the postcode part of the bucket (e.g. 'HA4 8RG').

parameters.name: streetname
parameters.description: Specifies the street part of the bucket (e.g. 'Acacia Avenue').

parameters.name: townname
parameters.description: Specifies the town part of the bucket (e.g. 'Ruislip').

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Specifies the offset from zero, used for pagination.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Specifies the number of addresses to return.

parameters.name: classificationfilter
parameters.description: Classification code filter. Can be pattern match (ZW*), exact match (RD06), multiple exact match (RD02,RD04) or a preset keyword such as residential, commercial or workplace

parameters.name: historical
parameters.description: Include historical addresses

parameters.name: verbose
parameters.description: Include the full address details in the response (including relatives, crossRefs, paf and nag).

parameters.name: epoch
parameters.description: Select a specific AddressBase Epoch to search.

200.description: Success. A json return of matched addresses.

400.description: Bad request. Indicates an issue with the request. Further details are provided in the response.

401.description: Unauthorised. The API key provided with the request is invalid.

429.description: Server too busy. The Address Index API is experiencing exceptional load.

500.description: Internal server error. Failed to process the request due to an internal error.

post.description: Will process all `BulkQuery` items in the `BulkBody` returns reduced information on found addresses (uprn, formatted address).

parameters.name: limitperaddress
parameters.description: Specifies the maximum number of matches to return per address.

parameters.name: historical
parameters.description: Include historical addresses

parameters.name: matchthreshold
parameters.description: Minimum confidence score (percentage) for match to be included in results.

200.description: Success. A json return of matched addresses.

400.description: Bad request. Indicates an issue with the request. Further details are provided in the response.

401.description: Unauthorised. The API key provided with the request is invalid.

429.description: Server too busy. The Address Index API is experiencing exceptional load.

500.description: Internal server error. Failed to process the request due to an internal error.

post.summary: Post bulk addresses for a full address output.
post.description: Will process all `BulkQuery` items in the `BulkBody` this version is slower and more memory-consuming since all the information on found addresses is returned.

parameters.name: limitperaddress
parameters.description: Specifies the maximum number of matches to return per address.

parameters.name: historical
parameters.description: Include historical addresses

parameters.name: matchthreshold
parameters.description: Minimum confidence score (percentage) for match to be included in results.

200.description: Success. A json return of matched addresses.

400.description: Bad request. Indicates an issue with the request. Further details are provided in the response.

401.description: Unauthorised. The API key provided with the request is invalid.

429.description: Server too busy. The Address Index API is experiencing exceptional load.

500.description: Internal server error. Failed to process the request due to an internal error.

info.title: ONS Address Index API
info.description: The ONS Address Index API lets you retrieve the official version of addresses in England and Wales. The data is currently updated on a 6 week rolling basis.
